faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: All the answers to your questions about our contest
faq.question1: How can I be sure it's reliable?
faq.answer1: We organize a draw every month. The winner is directly contacted by phone or email within 48h after the draw. Plus, we use Stripe for payments, guaranteeing the security of your transactions. Make sure to provide your phone number and email when purchasing your ticket!
faq.answer2: Absolutely! The more tickets you buy, the more you multiply your chances of winning. With the Gold ticket, you get 4 entries to maximize your chances. The number of entries is unlimited.
faq.question3: How do I receive my prize if I win?
faq.answer3: For physical items (iPhone, etc.), we ship for free within 48h throughout France. For cash prizes, we make a bank transfer within 3-5 business days.
faq.question4: What happens if no one wins?
faq.answer4: That's impossible! We always draw a winner among all participants. If the winner doesn't respond within 7 days, we proceed with a new draw.
faq.answer5: No hidden fees! The displayed price is the final price. Delivery is free in mainland France for all physical prizes. If you live abroad, you'll just need to pay international shipping costs.
